WorkItem.Description:
I was trying to use PHPExcel to create a huge xslx file contianing more than 64000 rows with about 15 cells per row containing strings.
This needs mass more than 300MB of RAM.
 
Maybe you want to take a look at this blig post diskussing an php garbidge collection bug affecting parent child relationed classes:
